data.actual_result: The filter changes to all servers
data.expected_result: The filter stays on this server
data.short_description: Rotating your screen on the recent mentions page when on a this server filter changes the filter too all servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the server list - Go to the @ symbol (it is between your name and the settings icon) - Go to the filter icon - Choose this server - Rotate screen
